程序包 uk.ac.ed.inf

类 PathBuilder

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.PathBuilder
public class PathBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类 
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    (专用程序包) class  PathBuilder.Move
    The class stores a single straight movement.
    (专用程序包) class  PathBuilder.OrderDestination
    The class stores the detail of an order used to write into deliveries table.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void buildPath​(java.lang.String date)
    Method to build the complete path for all possible orders in the input date without run out of the battery, and write the information to the database, also generate a geojson file.
    private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> findDeliverPath​(int battery, java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> destinationList)
    Method to find a path for the input order, when concern the battery and angle limit, but not when concern the step length limit.
    private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> generatePath​(java.lang.String date)
    Method to get the orders details and generate complete path without concerning the step length for the input date
    private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> getDestination​(java.util.List<OrderDetail> orders)
    Method to transform the order detail list to a list of PathBuilder.OrderDestination include all necessary waypoints
    private java.util.List<LongLat> getOrderDestination​(OrderDetail order)
    Method to extract the order waypoints detail from a OrderDetail object
    private PathBuilder.Move movementCalculator​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.lang.String orderNumber)
    Method to calculate the battery cost and precise location when concern the step length limit
    private java.util.List<OrderDetail> sortByValue​(java.util.List<OrderDetail> orders)
    Method to sort the order by the cost in pence in decreasing order
    private void writeDeliveriesTable​(java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> finalPath)
    Method to write delivered the order information into deliveries table
    private java.util.List<LongLat> writeFlightpathTable​(java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> finalPath)
    Method to write the precise path when concern both step length limit and angle limit into flightpath table, and return the precise path as a list of key points

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PathBuilder

      public PathBuilder​(java.lang.String webPort, java.lang.String dbPort)
      Constructor of PathBuilder class.
      参数:
      webPort - the communication web port to the server
      dbPort - the communication derbyDB port to the server

  • 方法详细资料

    • buildPath

      public void buildPath​(java.lang.String date)
      Method to build the complete path for all possible orders in the input date without run out of the battery, and write the information to the database, also generate a geojson file.
      参数:
      date - the date to build the path for

    • generatePath

      private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> generatePath​(java.lang.String date)
      Method to get the orders details and generate complete path without concerning the step length for the input date
      参数:
      date - the date to be used
      返回:
      the order details and path for every order in type of list of PathBuilder.OrderDestination

    • writeDeliveriesTable

      private void writeDeliveriesTable​(java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> finalPath)
      Method to write delivered the order information into deliveries table
      参数:
      finalPath - the list contain all delivered order information

    • writeFlightpathTable

      private java.util.List<LongLat> writeFlightpathTable​(java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> finalPath)
      Method to write the precise path when concern both step length limit and angle limit into flightpath table, and return the precise path as a list of key points
      参数:
      finalPath - the list contain the path not when concern the step length limit
      返回:
      the precise path when concern both step length limit and angle limit in type of list of LongLat

    • findDeliverPath

      private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> findDeliverPath​(int battery, java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> destinationList)
      Method to find a path for the input order, when concern the battery and angle limit, but not when concern the step length limit.
      参数:
      battery - total battery available
      destinationList - the list store all the necessary waypoint for all orders
      返回:
      the list contain precise path when concern battery and angle limit for every order in type of list of PathBuilder.OrderDestination

    • movementCalculator

      private PathBuilder.Move movementCalculator​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.lang.String orderNumber)
      Method to calculate the battery cost and precise location when concern the step length limit
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      orderNumber - the order number
      返回:
      the object contain battery cost and precise location in type of PathBuilder.Move

    • sortByValue

      private java.util.List<OrderDetail> sortByValue​(java.util.List<OrderDetail> orders)
      Method to sort the order by the cost in pence in decreasing order
      参数:
      orders - the order list to be sort
      返回:
      sorted order detail list

    • getDestination

      private java.util.List<PathBuilder.OrderDestination> getDestination​(java.util.List<OrderDetail> orders)
      Method to transform the order detail list to a list of PathBuilder.OrderDestination include all necessary waypoints
      参数:
      orders - the order detail list
      返回:
      a list of object in type of PathBuilder.OrderDestination contain all necessary waypoints and order details

    • getOrderDestination

      private java.util.List<LongLat> getOrderDestination​(OrderDetail order)
      Method to extract the order waypoints detail from a OrderDetail object
      参数:
      order - the order detail
      返回:
      a path include all necessary waypoints of the input order
